label: Neutral
short_description: Palms facing each other. Highly joint-friendly.

label: Neutral -> Pronated
short_description: Start neutral, twist to pronated at the top of the concentric phase.

label: Neutral -> Supinated
short_description: Start neutral, twist to supinated at the top. Maximizes bicep peak contraction.

label: Pronated
short_description: Palms facing away from you (or down).

label: Neutral -> Semi-Pro
short_description: Start neutral, twist slightly downward.

label: Supinated
short_description: Palms facing toward you (or up). Maximizes bicep engagement.

label: Neutral -> Semi-Sup
short_description: Start neutral, twist slightly upward.

label: Semi-Pronated
short_description: Slightly angled inward from pronated. Reduces wrist strain.

label: Pronated -> Neutral
short_description: Start pronated, twist to neutral at peak contraction. Great for lat engagement.

label: Semi-Supinated
short_description: Slightly angled inward from supinated. The standard EZ-bar grip.

label: Pronated -> Supinated
short_description: Full 180-degree rotation from overhand to underhand.

label: Rotating
short_description: Hand position rotates during the movement.

label: Alternating
short_description: One palm faces you, one faces away. Prevents bar rolling.

label: Pronated -> Semi-Sup
short_description: Start overhand, twist to an angled underhand.

label: Flat Palms Up
short_description: Weight rests on the palms or arms without wrapping the fingers.

label: Supinated -> Neutral
short_description: Start underhand, twist to neutral.

label: Other
short_description: Any non-standard grip attachment.

label: Supinated -> Pronated
short_description: Start underhand, push and twist to overhand (The classic Arnold Press path).

label: Supinated -> Semi-Pro
short_description: Start underhand, twist to angled overhand.

label: Semi-Pro -> Neutral
short_description: Start angled overhand, twist to parallel.

label: Semi-Pro -> Supinated
short_description: Start angled overhand, finish fully underhand.

label: Semi-Pro -> Semi-Sup
short_description: Moving between the two angled positions.

label: Semi-Sup -> Neutral
short_description: Start angled underhand, finish parallel.

label: Semi-Sup -> Pronated
short_description: Start angled underhand, finish fully overhand.

label: Semi-Sup -> Semi-Pro
short_description: Moving between the two angled positions in reverse.

label: Hook Grip
short_description: Thumb locked under fingers for heavy pulls
